## Attempt to fix parse errors in Glikman's ASCII tables by checking consistency with
## Table 5 of her 2010 paper
## checked: Rmag, z, spectrum M1450, K-corrected M1450, fsel, fspec, Area
## Typo for DLSJ105346.14-052859.5: M1450k=-22.40 instead of -20.40
## remaining inconsistency in z_lim and V_a, paper reports z_lim=z_QSO but ASCII files are different
## DLS: ASCII files report the same z_lim and V_a for spectrum M1450 and K-corrected M1450,
##      probably due to erroneous listing of spectrum M1450 for K-corrected M1450 in that file,
##      we list both values from Glikman's Table 5
## NDWFS: z_lim scrambled the same way as M1450 in ASCII files, de-scrambled the same way
## -> Use z_lim and accessible volumes with caution!
#QSO                      Rmag  z    M1450s M1450k fsel  fspec z_lim V_as  V_ak   Area
